Dart Conference

Including Flutter and AngularDart

January 23-24, 2018

Dart's mission is to make it possible to build next-generation user experiences — on the web, on iOS, on Android, everywhere. DartConf is the premier event that connects Flutter and AngularDart developers together, and to the Google engineers who work on these projects.

Venice Beach, LA
1 Track
2 Days
1 Party
+16 Talks
350 Attendees

We are building a strong line-up of speakers

Stay tuned for more updates!

Venue

The Dart Conference will take place at the beautiful Google Los Angeles campus, just 5 minutes walk from the creative and the artistic Venice Beach.

The campus is located in the renovated iconic Frank Gehry-designed Binocular Building, a uniquely hi-tech styled campus that includes an amazing production space as well as the beautiful outdoor courtyard.

Google Los Angeles
320 Hampton Dr, Venice, CA 90291
United States
